titleStmt.title: His Majesties letter to the Lords and others of his Privy Council
titleStmt.author: James II, King of England, 1633-1701.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II) aut

notesStmt.note: At end: Given at S. Germans en Laye the 4/14 of January 1688/9. and of our reign the fourth year.
Recites reasons for his leaving England.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
